channel.title: Need an explanation, math/pawn
channel.description: This is for a private server i am working on, not rs, not java... [code] X+=(5*floatsin(-floatsub(A,45.0),degrees)), Y+=(5*floatcos(-floatsub(A,45.0),degrees)); [/code] some one gave me this code, and i dont really understand it, can some one explain it a bit? x,y,z are coords of the vehicle, a is its angle, and when you run this, it puts the person outside the passenger door...

item.title: Need an explanation, math/pawn
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

X+=(5*floatsin(-floatsub(A,45.0),degrees)), Y+=(5*floatcos(-floatsub(A,45.0),degrees));

floatsub just subtracts, but for float datatypes.
floatsin executes a sine operation, again for float datatypes.

It uses some simple trigonometry to figure out where to plant the player entity after exiting the vehicle entity.

GTA?

Read full topic
